definition: as you see fit/to do as one likes
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
see 便宜|便宜[pian2 yi5]

sentences.english: Within the limitation of quantity you are free to do as you choose.
sentences.chinese: 在這個限量內你可以任便。

definition: to ride to take up an official appointment (idiom); to take on a job with alacrity/to undertake a task
key task/important affair
to take office/to assume a post
to take over/to take control
to appoint
to take over (as minister, manager etc)
to set apart/to assign sb to a job
to ask sb to resign from a post
to hand over to a successor/to relinquish one's office
to resign from office/to dismiss from office
advocate strongly
period in office
urgent task/pressing matter
select the best people for promotion
to travel to take up a new post
ordained or appointed to a post/to benefit from counsel
